abstract.p: Bristol-Myers Squibb will consolidate and realign advertising agency assignments for its Clairoil and Mead Johnson Nutritionals consumer brands at agencies of B Com3 Group and True North Communications (Advertising column) (S)

block.p: Bristol-Myers Squibb in New York said yesterday that it would consolidate and realign the agency assignments for its Clairol and Mead Johnson Nutritionals consumer brands at agencies of the B Com3 Group and True North Communications. Spending for these assignments last year was estimated at more than $135 million by Competitive Media Reporting, a unit of Taylor Nelson Sofres that tracks ad spending.

The Clairol brands had been handled by offices of D'Arcy Masius Benton & Bowles in New York, part of B Com3 ; FCB Worldwide in New York, part of True North; the Kaplan Thaler Group in New York, part of B Com3 ; Ogilvy & Mather Worldwide in New York, part of the WPP Group; and some smaller agencies, said Pete Paradossi, a spokesman for Bristol-Myers Squibb.

Bristol-Myers Squibb in New York said yesterday that it would consolidate and realign the agency assignments for its Clairol and Mead Johnson Nutritionals consumer brands at agencies of the B Com3 Group and True North Communications. Spending for these assignments last year was estimated at more than $135 million by Competitive Media Reporting, a unit of Taylor Nelson Sofres that tracks ad spending.

The Clairol brands had been handled by offices of D'Arcy Masius Benton & Bowles in New York, part of B Com3 ; FCB Worldwide in New York, part of True North; the Kaplan Thaler Group in New York, part of B Com3 ; Ogilvy & Mather Worldwide in New York, part of the WPP Group; and some smaller agencies, said Pete Paradossi, a spokesman for Bristol-Myers Squibb.

Now, he said, Clairol in the United States will be split between FCB and Kaplan Thaler. FCB will handle hair color brands like Nice 'n Easy and Revitalique; Kaplan Thaler will get hair and skin care brands. Internationally, all Clairol business will be handled by FCB.

The Mead Johnson assignments, Mr. Paradossi said, for brands like Enfamil infant formula had been handled by agencies including FCB, the Mexico City office of Grey Advertising, part of the Grey Global Group; Lotas Minard Patton McIver in New York; Ogilvy; and the Quantum Group in Parsippany, N.J., part of the CommonHealth unit of WPP. Mead Johnson assignments will be handled by D'Arcy.
